---
title: "2021 Schedule"
output: html_document
---

```{r generate_dates, include=FALSE}
## first day of class
start_date <- as.Date("2023-03-28")
## all tues
tues <- seq.Date(from = start_date, by = 7, length.out = 10)
## all thur
thur <- tues + 2
## all qtr
qtr <- sort(c(tues, thur))
qtr <- sub("0(\\d)", "\\1", format(qtr, "%d %b"))
```
